series_description: This series documents the Division's targeted areas of study of highway corridors with a high number of severe accidents. This series may include, but is not limited to, notifications.
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_description: This series documents the construction and maintenance of permanentsite traffic counters by a contractor. This series may include, but is not limited to, reports and supporting documentation.
retention_statement: 1 Year after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_description: This series documents the construction and maintenance of short-term traffic counter sites using Automated Traffic Recorder Monitoring. This series may include, but is not limited to, reports and supporting documentation.
retention_statement: 1 Year after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_description: This series documents the Division's recommendations for a project design from an operational and safety perspective. This series may include, but is not limited to, correspondence.
retention_statement: 2 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_title: Highway Rail Safety Improvement Program: Projects
series_description: This series documents the identifications, prioritizations, and funding for the Traffic Engineering Highway Rail Safety Improvement Program projects. This series may include, but is not limited to, forms and correspondence.
retention_statement: 10 Years after closed

series_title: Highway Rail Safety Improvement Program: Special Studies
series_description: This series documents special studies requested by public officials, politicians or locality officials. This series may include, but is not limited to, railroad crossing studies and findings.
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_title: Highway Safety Improvement Program: Annual Report
series_description: This series documents VDOT's annual report to the Federal Highway Administration on safety improvement efforts, including the Highway Safety Improvement Program, Bicycle Pedestrian Safety Program, and the Railway-Highway Grade Crossing Improvement Program. This series may include, but is not limited to, reports.

series_title: Highway Safety Improvement Program: Project Proposal
series_description: This series documents applications for highway safety projects. This series may include, but is not limited to, application forms, bicycle and pedestrian safety proposals.
retention_statement: 2 Years after decision

series_description: This series documents annual historic traffic volume estimates by utilizing the Traffic Monitoring System Database. This series may include, but is not limited to, reports.

This series documents detailed operational plans that define state and local agency roles and responsibilities during a traffic incident that may require the closure of a roadway, bridge, or tunnel, resulting in a detour around the incident site. This series may include, but is not limited to, incident management plans.
retention_statement: 5 Years after issuance

series_description: This series documents the use, types, locations, mile markers, roadways, and GPS coordinates of logo signs that are placed along Virginia highways by contractors. This series may include, but is not limited to, evaluations, work orders, and support documentation.

This series documents the Division's memorandums of operational directives relating to guidance provided on traffic operations when guidance has not been provided or clarified by law. This series may include, but is not limited to, memoranda and supporting documentation.

This series documents the Division's official position on issues and requests for information received from the Districts, other Divisions, and the public. This series may include, but is not limited to, letters, correspondence, and memorandums.
retention_statement: 10 Years after end of calendar year

series_description: This series documents listings of traffic control devices that are eligible for use on a project and (or which) are issued quarterly. This series include, but is not limited to, listings.

This series documents the Division's responses to complaints about traffic engineering that have been received by either the VDOT Commissioner or the Secretary of Administration. This series includes, but is not limited to, correspondence and supporting documentation.
retention_statement: 10 Years after end of calendar year

series_description: This series documents all public grade crossing locations. This series may include, but is not limited to, inventories and photographs.
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_description: This series documents the traffic data VDOT gathers at remote traffic monitoring sites, transmits via modem to Central Office, downloads into the Weigh-In Motion (WIM) database, manipulates for report production, and updates to Federal Highway Administration. This series may include, but is not limited to, databases and reports.
This series documents the traffic signal installation process. This series may include, but is not limited to, plans, cost estimates, and other documentation.
retention_statement: 3 Years after equipment, facility, or property sold or no longer in use

series_description: This series documents annual preventive maintenance performed on all traffic signals. This series may include, but is not limited to, reports and spreadsheets.
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_description: This series documents original plans by the Division or consultants for use in determining traffic signal placement and construction materials which may become incorporated into project plans. This series may include, but is not limited to, plans.
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_description: This series documents the notification, dates, times, locations, and repairs completed on a malfunctioning traffic signal. This series may include, but is not limited to, log sheets.
retention_statement: 3 Years after end of calendar year

series_description: This series documents the timing and phasing of traffic signals. This series may include, but is not limited to, logs and drawings.
retention_statement: 3 Years after end of calendar year

series_description: This series documents the dimensions, types, and specifications of and pavement markings located along interstate roadways. This series may include, but is not limited to, plans and drawings.
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_title: Signs/Pavement Markings: Miss Utility Ticket File
series_description: This series documents the calls made to "Miss Utility" in case a utility line is broken or hit by a sign crew. This series may include, but is not limited to, tickets.
retention_statement: 1 Year after end of calendar year

series_description: This series documents warranty disputes and monitors the durability of pavement markings. This series may include, but is not limited to, forms.
retention_statement: 6 Years after end of calendar year

series_description: This series documents requests for commercial entrances onto a Virginia roadway. This series may include, but is not limited to: studies, site plans, recommendations, reviews, and sketches.
retention_statement: 0 Years after event

series_description: This series documents consultant traffic impact studies and commercial site plans for subdivisions. This series may include, but is not limited to, studies, plans, and recommendations.
retention_statement: 5 Years after event

series_description: This series documents multiple online traffic simulations used to test analyze engineering studies of an intersection, route corridor, or for geometric improvements to a specified site. This series may include, is not limited to, simulations, tests, and analysis.

This series documents the studies made by the Districts in response to request from a citizen, residency, or Central Office for a safety or speed study of a particular route. This series may include, but is not limited to, studies, recommendations, and correspondence.
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_description: This series documents truck studies conducted at the request of individuals or government officials. This series may include, but is not limited to: reports, roadway descriptions, traffic analysis, summaries, and recommendations.
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_description: This series documents the studies undertaken by the Central Office, their findings, when cut-through traffic studies are initially conducted by the District and no agreement on a solution can be reached at the District level. This series may include, but is not limited to: letters, memorandums, technical reports, correspondence, engineering studies, and supporting documentation.
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_description: This series documents studies conducted in response to a citizen, locality, or Central Office request and to determine the need for the installation of overhead signs at an intersection. This series may but is not limited to: studies, roadway descriptions, traffic analysis, summaries, and recommendations.
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_description: This series documents all traffic engineering study activity performed on a route section that is not at an intersection nor project-related. This series may include, but is not limited to, studies.
retention_statement: 0 Years after no longer administratively useful

series_description: This series documents investigations and studies for speed limit adjustments forwarded to the Central Office for approval and approved resolutions. This series may include, but is not limited to: resolutions, investigations, studies, work papers, and supporting documentation.

This series documents studies in response to a citizen, locality, or internal request to determine the need for the installation of traffic lights at an intersection. This series may include, but is not limited to: studies, roadway descriptions, traffic analysis, summaries, and recommendations.
retention_statement: 5 Years after issuance

series_description: This series documents the guidelines and criteria used in granting the erection of a supplemental guide sign along Virginia roadways. This series may include, but is not limited to: correspondence, approvals, denials, and installations.

This series documents the process for approving or denying requests inclusion of routes into the Surface Transportation Assistance Act (STAA) network. This series may include, but is not limited to, requests, data, and correspondence.

series_title: Surface Transportation Assistance Act (STAA): Route Study
series_description: This series documents studies conducted at the request of trucking companies that wish to travel on non-Surface Transportation Assistance Act (STAA) routes. This series may include, but is not limited to, requests studies, videos, and supporting documentation.
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_title: Surface Transportation Assistance Act (STAA): Truck Routing Map/Addendum
series_description: This series documents the notification to truckers of any changes to Surface Transportation Assistance Act (STAA) routes after annual publication of the map. This series includes, but is not limited to, maps, addenda, and any supporting documentation
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_description: This series documents the process of approving or denying a request through-truck restrictions on secondary roads. This series may include, but is not limited to: requests, studies, analyses, recommendations, resolutions, and decisions.
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_description: This series documents information from permanent and temporary count systems. This series may include, but is not limited to, reports.

This series documents ongoing and special traffic counts data, as well as requests from citizens, community groups, or other interested parties to conduct a traffic count at a certain location to prove or disprove the need to pave a road, widen a road, etc. This series may include, but is not limited to: requests, studies, analyses, and decisions.
retention_statement: 5 Years after end of calendar year

series_description: This series documents contracts for traffic counting services administered by the Division. This series may include, but is not limited to: contracts, bid reviews, bid tabulations, insurance certifications, and supporting documentation.
retention_statement: 5 Years after expiration

series_title: VDOT Junction Screening Tool (VJuST): Submitted Material
series_description: This series documents information submitted by agencies, businesses, and localities into the Junction Screening Tool system. This series may include, but is not limited to, forms and submitted material.
retention_statement: 3 Years after creation

series_title: Virginia Supplement to the Manual on Uniform Traffic Control Devices (MUTCD)
series_description: This series documents the promulgation of State Standards for traffic control devices that exceed minimum federal requirements, including any pertinent traffic control device design, installation, and operational details not covered in the Manual on Uniform Traffic Control Devices.

This series documents the promotion of the uniform standards of traffic, previously published as Part VI of the Virginia Supplement to the Manual on Uniform Traffic Control Devices for Streets and Highways (MUTCD). This series may include, but is not limited to, correspondence and reports.
This series documents the Division's designed work zones and detours. This series includes, but is not limited to, layouts.
retention_statement: 3 Years after project completion
